thread.title: 70-Year-Old Vietnam Veteran With Concealed Carry Permit Fends Off Two Men Who Try To Rob Him
thread.title_full: 70-Year-Old Vietnam Veteran With Concealed Carry Permit Fends Off Two Men Who Try To Rob Him

author: Andrew Mark Miller
title: 70-Year-Old Vietnam Veteran With Concealed Carry Permit Fends Off Two Men Who Try To Rob Him
text:
10:41pm February 6,   
There are few things more satisfying than clear cut examples of why liberals are totally wrong about the 2nd Amendment. 
You’ll love this one. 
From Weasel Zippers via Free Beacon : 
A 70-year-old Vietnam veteran defended himself with his legally concealed firearm against a pair of much younger armed robbers on Thursday near St. Louis, Mo. 
As the veteran was dropping off a friend, a 19-year-old male and a 23-year-old male pulled up next to him in a car, asked for directions, and then pulled out a gun. The 70-year-old veteran pulled out his own gun and shot at both of the men as they attempted to rob him. The 19-year-old suspect was killed and the 23-year-old was injured during the encounter. 
It’s never good when someone loses their life. 
However, this 70-year-old Vietnam veteran looks like he certainly was about to lose his. 
Are you going to sit him down and tell him that he shouldn’t have had the right to survive in that instance? 
I don’t think so. 
Yet another example of how important it is to understand the Constitution. LIKE this article?
